contentitemdata.goldfinch.blogpost.BlogPostSummary: Learn how to integrate Shopify with Xperience by Kentico to combine powerful e-commerce features with a versatile Digital Experience Platform. This guide covers setup, synchronisation, and configuration, making it easy to create dynamic online experiences and save on integration costs.
contentitemdata.goldfinch.blogpost.DocumentName: Integrating Headless Shopify with Xperience by Kentico
